channel.title: Hollow Knight: Greenpath Remix - BobTheGUYYYYY [chill, EDM, ambient]
channel.description:
<big>**3 months.**</big>
That’s how long I was struck with producer’s block. I tried to write music pretty often but could never formulate something full, something great.
Then I played this game called **Hollow Knight.** (You should play it, it’s *amazing*. It’s a beautiful metroidvania style game) and my producer’s block
was finally *gone* for once
here’s the result
[![image|500x500](upload://mo0iTDocpyXYjpiO7K5VH3JKySN.png)](https://soundcloud.com/bobtheguyyyyy/greenpath-remix-bobtheguyyyyy)
<small>Strike that cover art with your nail</small>
